name: Sprint 'n Slide
description:
A simple, two-button game. Left arrow swaps the position of the left block, and right arrow makes the block jump on the right. See how high a score you can get!

I am aware of Windows Defender's odd 'wat is this'-type response and am looking into it.

Code and music each written within an hour as a personal challenge. Special thanks to Daniel Linssen for the inspiration of his one-game-one-thing dev style!
